description.en: Try to shoot a ping pong ball out as far as you can. Place your robot at and try to shoot the ball across the length of the field. Or even farther.
Your robot has to stand still at start position.

Your robot managed to throw the ball to the middle of the field = Good job! Are you ready for another try?
Your robot threw the ball over the middle of the field = Wow! Excellent job! Do you think you can try again to see if you could throw farther?
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programing your robot?

Let's count your points.
You managed to throw the ball to the middle of the field = 5 points
You reached over the middle of the field = 10 points
You reached the edge of the field or even threw it farther = 15 points
